Sql.query: insert into cpa_porcentaje_energiapotencia ( cpapepcodi, cpapcodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, cpapepenemes01, cpapepenemes02, cpapepenemes03, cpapepenemes04, cpapepenemes05, cpapepenemes06, cpapepenemes07, cpapepenemes08, cpapepenemes09, cpapepenemes10, cpapepenemes11, cpapepenemes12, cpapepenetotal, cpapeppotmes01, cpapeppotmes02, cpapeppotmes03, cpapeppotmes04, cpapeppotmes05, cpapeppotmes06, cpapeppotmes07, cpapeppotmes08, cpapeppotmes09, cpapeppotmes10, cpapeppotmes11, cpapeppotmes12, cpapeppottotal, cpapepusucreacion, cpapepfeccreacion ) values ( :cpapepcodi, :cpapcodi, :cparcodi, :emprcodi, :cpapepenemes01, :cpapepenemes02, :cpapepenemes03, :cpapepenemes04, :cpapepenemes05, :cpapepenemes06, :cpapepenemes07, :cpapepenemes08, :cpapepenemes09, :cpapepenemes10, :cpapepenemes11, :cpapepenemes12, :cpapepenetotal, :cpapeppotmes01, :cpapeppotmes02, :cpapeppotmes03, :cpapeppotmes04, :cpapeppotmes05, :cpapeppotmes06, :cpapeppotmes07, :cpapeppotmes08, :cpapeppotmes09, :cpapeppotmes10, :cpapeppotmes11, :cpapeppotmes12, :cpapeppottotal, :cpapepusucreacion, :cpapepfeccreacion )

update cpa_porcentaje_energiapotencia set cpapcodi = :cpapcodi, cparcodi = :cparcodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, cpapepenemes01 = :cpapepenemes01, cpapepenemes02 = :cpapepenemes02, cpapepenemes03 = :cpapepenemes03, cpapepenemes04 = :cpapepenemes04, cpapepenemes05 = :cpapepenemes05, cpapepenemes06 = :cpapepenemes06, cpapepenemes07 = :cpapepenemes07, cpapepenemes08 = :cpapepenemes08, cpapepenemes09 = :cpapepenemes09, cpapepenemes10 = :cpapepenemes10, cpapepenemes11 = :cpapepenemes11, cpapepenemes12 = :cpapepenemes12, cpapepenetotal = :cpapepenetotal, cpapeppotmes01 = :cpapeppotmes01, cpapeppotmes02 = :cpapeppotmes02, cpapeppotmes03 = :cpapeppotmes03, cpapeppotmes04 = :cpapeppotmes04, cpapeppotmes05 = :cpapeppotmes05, cpapeppotmes06 = :cpapeppotmes06, cpapeppotmes07 = :cpapeppotmes07, cpapeppotmes08 = :cpapeppotmes08, cpapeppotmes09 = :cpapeppotmes09, cpapeppotmes10 = :cpapeppotmes10, cpapeppotmes11 = :cpapeppotmes11, cpapeppotmes12 = :cpapeppotmes12, cpapeppottotal = :cpapeppottotal, cpapepusucreacion = :cpapepusucreacion, cpapepfeccreacion = :cpapepfeccreacion where cpapepcodi = :cpapepcodi
select * from cpa_porcentaje_energiapotencia order by cpapepcodi asc

select temp.tipoemprcodi, temp.tipoemprdesc, emp.emprnomb, emp.emprruc, pep.* from cpa_porcentaje_energiapotencia pep inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = pep.emprcodi inner join si_tipoempresa temp on temp.tipoemprcodi = emp.tipoemprcodi where (-1 = {0} or pep.cparcodi = {0}) order by case when temp.tipoemprcodi = 3 then 1 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 4 then 2 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 2 then 3 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 1 then 4 end, emp.emprnomb
